songs.title: Are You Sitting Comfortably?
songs.lyrics:
[Produced by Skream]

[Intro]
You could smell their lust for me
Are you sitting comfortably?
I know you had a violent trust for me
But are you sitting comfortably?
Should've never made a fuss of me
Tell me, tell me, tell me
Are you sitting comfortably?

[Verse 1]
Watch it burn, watch em learn, turning in my grave
Spend your wages on a flashy watch and watch time fade away
I chose to spend my wages on a class they call it A
And everyday I made new friends but can't recall their names
Performance enhancers with a couple of chancers
Sat there in a dark room chatting to dancers
Slave to the riddim and I'm killing 'em softly, so wrong like The Black Swan, Darren Aranofsky
Crying fuck's sake whilst staying awake, my blood's made of coffee

[Hook]
You got a little scared now you always wanna sleep with the light on
Always telling me what I gotta do like your name's Simon
Got your hands wrapped around my throat, articulated python
So tell me, tell me, tell me
Are you sitting comfortably?

[Verse 2]
Your mother on a power trip, lecture on a sour tip
Falling asleep now, need to get an hours kip
I shoulda gone bed but I chose to creep, see I followed those sheep now you're Little Bo Peep
And you're lost at home, tomorrow I'll claim that I lost my phone at Watch the Throne
Lost my mind 4 years ago on an ego trip down Curtain Road
No way back now I'm living my life in a certain mode and the curtain's closed
Married to the rave and I misbehaved, but I'd do it all over again
Off to offy I'm off my head, often sleep in a coffin

[Hook]

You could smell their lust for me
I know you had a violent trust for me
Tell me, tell me, tell me
Are you sitting comfortably?

[Hook]
